content: I haven't seen any feedback from anyone other than Paul Knapp. I could presume that means everyone else is happy and has no questions, but just in case, a reminder to review the requirements document... https://docs.google.com/document/d/1NfrxaF5K4-1artUfGOadkM-NFdNd2IHeNRqeoVyq_ys/edit?ts=5a5d9b2a
